title: Mon Post Show (04-25-22)
itunes:title: Mon Post Show (04-25-22)
description:
Bobby and Eddie recap the weekend opening for Garth with more stories from Arkansas. He also reveals the gift Garth gave him. Bobby shares a story on how intermittent fasting doesn’t work. Also, two plane crash stories with a stunt gone wrong and a plane crash that was intentional. Amy got a scam warning about a scam. Mike D reviews the new Nic Cage movie. We also get into how the last 2 years have messed with our heads. Amy gives an update on her pet psychic reading.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
